extendedInfo.description: CDOT Mobile is the only App that is sanctioned by the state and has the most accurate data about whatâs happening on Coloradoâs highways in real-time. Quite simply, we want to help you get to where you need to go quickly and safely as you travel throughout the beautiful state of Colorado. Our App is refreshed / updated frequently with the most up-to-date travel information available so be sure to check in regularly. What You Get CDOT Mobile will provide travelers with: â¢speeds and travel times â¢road conditions â¢incidents and road closures â¢road work to include construction and maintenance activities â¢and data from CDOTâs closed circuit television cameras All available in real-time -- and based upon your location. The information CDOT provides on CDOT Mobile is enhanced with data from: â¢weather data from Weather Underground â¢directional maps from Google â¢as well as offers and deals from businesses near you All in an effort to provide you with the most complete travel data. Your Privacy is Important to Us CDOT Mobile will NOT: â¢make available any of your personal information â¢sell any of your personal data â¢transmit your location outside of your device Your data is analyzed only in aggregate and used only for the purposes of improving and enhancing the features and performance of the application.

reviews.title: Are you kidding me?
reviews.comment: Now you are pushing ads through your notifications?! Unacceptable.
reviews.author: Harmoni Karlbom

reviews.title: Pathetic App
reviews.comment: This app is cumbersome to navigate and inconsistent from one hwy system to another. The focus seems to be for skiers traveling I-70. I would get alley notifications but could never get to any detail. I could never recommend this app to anyone.
reviews.author: Bernie Seward

reviews.title: Finally works!
reviews.comment: I downloaded the latest update and the app finally works on my Galaxy S II (Jellybean). Thank you! Everything works and looks good, so far. Sucks there are ads, but I don\'t mind CDOT collecting a little revenue as long as they keep the app working.
reviews.author: Dan Kiel

reviews.title: Useless outside I-25/I-70
reviews.comment: Mobile website is far more useful than this app if you are looking for travel information on roads outside of I-25 and I-70... do not install if you use a lot of mountain passes and Colorado highways (285, 287, 40, etc...)
reviews.author: Jason Johnston

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: I use it all the time.
reviews.author: Harriet Denby

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: Still doesn\'t work on my Samsung Galaxy Nexus!!!
reviews.author: Noell S. Chesney

reviews.title: nice!
reviews.comment: thanks for remembering I-25
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working / Updated july 2013
reviews.comment: Just a black screen on my Nexus 7 (32 GB). Updated: The new update for Nexus 7 or Cdot who knows. But it\'s working. Not to much info. and only if you live in the Denver area. There is not much I like about this app. I live west of Colorado Springs (GMF). All I get is traffic & well that\'s it. Uninstalled. keep up the good work Cdot. lol.
reviews.author: Robert Tyler

reviews.comment: Great when it wants to work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Since the July 24 update
reviews.comment: Happy to report it now works with my Samsung Note 2 but that\'s about the extent of my good remarks.  Interface is cumbersome and difficult to use.  With the app being titled trip planner I would have thought that would be a way 2 navigate from point A to B and have it help you get there the fastest easiest most direct way.  Nope.  Guess it isn\'t bad if you just want to check travel delays and look at it highway cameras but you can do that on Google too so I\'ll stick with that.
reviews.author: Jason Glenski

reviews.comment: Like.  Seems faster
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy note II
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app and it works great.  I was surprised at the how well the app was developed.  It has some good options to choose from to personalize it the way you want
reviews.author: Michael Hilton

reviews.title: Blank screen.
reviews.comment: Do not download this. This app is completely unacceptable.the app is worthless unless they pull their head out of their butts. All I get is a blank screen. Tried uninstall/re-install, and, no dice. I have a blank screen, so I will blank this from my app list. Uninstall...
reviews.author: David Clarkson

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: App would never open. I get a  black screen and app closed
reviews.author: Frank Torrez

reviews.title: Motorola Razr
reviews.comment: This app works great on the Motorola Razr.  I drive a truck for a living and use app to check for chain restrictions on Vail pass and the Eisenhower tunnel.  Conditions are updated every 3 minutes for this app.  The road condition hot line only updates hourly, and sometimes longer.  Terrific app!
reviews.author: Jim Bell

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Just downloaded on my Samsung galaxy S2 and it just hangs on blank screen. How many complaints does it take to fix it. Obviously the white house awards committee was duped.
reviews.author: Doug Jones

reviews.title: Sucks on Samsung
reviews.comment: Won\'t load. You just get s blank screen, don\'t waste your time!
reviews.author: Angela Poe

reviews.title: Good app, but low quality qa process.
reviews.comment: The latest update had breaking changes.  Banner ads were added, and now none of the traffic info. screens load.  Instead, there is a blank white screen with banner ads.
reviews.author: Ananda Tracy

reviews.comment: I travel I-70 daily, this app saved me the other day...thank you so much dev! Excellent app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uesless
reviews.comment: Just hangs on a blank screen. There is no excuse for this type of behavior in an application. Especially one that is used for transportation safety.
reviews.author: Eric Greenfeder
